column1: {{discussion top|1=Consensus is for keeping this, at least for the time being. [[User:Sven Manguard|'''Sven Manguard''']] [[User talk:Sven Manguard|'''Wha?''']] 04:44, 15 November 2013 (UTC)
:And my vote here is also {{vote keep}} until relevant datatypes are available. -- [[User:Lavallen|Lavallen]] ([[User talk:Lavallen|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 11:23, 8 November 2013 (UTC)

:{{keep}} This has datatype 'item' and links to a page for the surname. This is a very different property and cannot be replaced by 'name'. [[User:Filceolaire|Filceolaire]] ([[User talk:Filceolaire|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 16:27, 8 November 2013 (UTC)
:{{keep}}, link between person and article about his surname is not good idea. — [[User:Ivan A. Krestinin|Ivan A. Krestinin]] ([[User talk:Ivan A. Krestinin|talk]]) 19:44, 8 November 2013 (UTC)
:{{keep}} The property name is comprehensive. [[User:לערי ריינהארט|לערי ריינהארט]] ([[User talk:לערי ריינהארט|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 19:52, 14 November 2013 (UTC)
